scripts.build:win: pkg . --target node18-win-x64 --output dist/win/organizer-daemon.exe && powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Path src/config/default.config.json -Destination dist/win/config.json"
scripts.build:linux: pkg . --target node18-linux-x64 --output dist/linux/organizer-daemon && cp src/config/default.config.json dist/linux/config.json
scripts.build:mac: pkg . --target node18-macos-x64 --output dist/mac/organizer-daemon && cp src/config/default.config.json dist/mac/config.json
scripts.build:all: npm run build:win && npm run build:linux && npm run build:mac
